text: Læa meux cea di hen phwk khea læw rangkay khxng phwk khea ca pen thi phung phxcı kæ cea læa hak phwk khea phud cea k ca fang kha phud khxng phwk khea prahnung wa phwk khea pen thxn mi thi thuk yan wi phwk khea khid wa thuk «seiyng rxng nan pen ptipaksʹ tx phwk khea phwk khea khux satru dangnan cng rawang phwk khea khx xallxhˌ thrng hı khwam xapys kæ phwk khea thami lea phwk khea cung hanhe xxk pi thang xun
